response.overview: The film tells that Tong Zhongyi has practiced swords, guns and clubs for half his life, but when the Japanese are ready to move, and the Chinese people are killing each other, he repents and no longer competes with others to gain a temporary level, but he has made everyone in Cangzhou martial. With his superb wrestling skills and noble martial arts, he stood on the world stage and was called "the god of wrestling" by the Chinese.
response.title: Chinese Wrestling Legend Of Fist
